Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

SseSpecification.description: The configuration options for customer provided KMS encryption.

properties.name: KmsKeyArn
properties.description: KMS Key Arn used to encrypt the group policy

type.description: KMS Key Arn used to encrypt the group policy

properties.name: CustomerManagedKeyEnabled
properties.description: Whether to encrypt the policy with the provided key or disable encryption

type.description: Whether to encrypt the policy with the provided key or disable encryption

resource.description: The AWS::EC2::VerifiedAccessGroup resource creates an AWS EC2 Verified Access Group.

properties.name: VerifiedAccessInstanceId
properties.description: The ID of the AWS Verified Access instance.

type.description: The ID of the AWS Verified Access instance.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: A description for the AWS Verified Access group.

type.description: A description for the AWS Verified Access group.

properties.name: PolicyDocument
properties.description: The AWS Verified Access policy document.

type.description: The AWS Verified Access policy document.

properties.name: PolicyEnabled
properties.description: The status of the Verified Access policy.

type.description: The status of the Verified Access policy.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

type.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

properties.name: SseSpecification
properties.description: The configuration options for customer provided KMS encryption.

type.description: The configuration options for customer provided KMS encryption.

attributes.description: The AWS::EC2::VerifiedAccessGroup resource creates an AWS EC2 Verified Access Group.

properties.name: VerifiedAccessGroupId
properties.description: The ID of the AWS Verified Access group.

type.description: The ID of the AWS Verified Access group.

properties.name: VerifiedAccessGroupArn
properties.description: The ARN of the Verified Access group.

type.description: The ARN of the Verified Access group.

properties.name: Owner
properties.description: The AWS account number that owns the group.

type.description: The AWS account number that owns the group.

properties.name: CreationTime
properties.description: Time this Verified Access Group was created.

type.description: Time this Verified Access Group was created.

properties.name: LastUpdatedTime
properties.description: Time this Verified Access Group was last updated.

type.description: Time this Verified Access Group was last updated.
